tracks.text: Silhouettes of Towa, Kei, Rakuro and Rei stand in front of portraits of their SLF characters Pencilgon, Oikatzo, Sunraku, and Psyger-0.
Text, Original Work, Katarina, Ryosuke Fuji. Serialized by Kodansha in Weekly Shounen Magazine
Rakuro wears a VR headset. A diamond shaped pendant swings in darkness.
A western style town stands at the foot of a hill with a castle at the top.
The sun sets and day turns to night.
Text, Shangri-La Frontier
Rakuro turns into Sunraku, who wields twin marsh daggers
Red water gurgles
Pencilgon descends to the ground and strikes with a spear
Katzo draws a red fist and black fist together, and her fists burst crimson.
Emul, a girl rabbit, Vash, Bilac, and Peitz walk along the Rabbituza palace verandah.
Psyger-0 and Psyger-100 stand back to back in a board room
Setsuna walks. Beyond her is the gnarled tree, high cliffs, and full moon.
A samurai covered in metal stares at us with glowing eyes. Fire licks his arms, shoulders, and stomach.
A metal horse rears in front of a red moon
A golden scale shifts
Sunraku holds a two handed long sword and strikes at shadowy ghouls that surround him in a misty, purple forest.
Dozens of shadowy figures stand on outcroppings. Their eyes glow red.
Pencilgon swings a spear in mist
A headless horse and horseman gallop. She strikes
Katzo does a flying back flip over skeletal monsters
The samurai draws a sword. The moon reflects in a muddy puddle. A drop splashes. Psyger-0 holds a sword, her long red plume blowing in the wind.
In a library, a girl with long pink braids and wide, green eyes smiles widely and reaches out a hand.
An orb lands on Sunraku's abs and glows
Sunraku grips a curved dagger. Wearing a beetle helmet and diamond shaped pendant, he runs forward. Katzo with red fists and Pencilgon with a spear run with him.
In slow motion, they approach the samurai. The world turns red.
Text, 14, Squish
Dragonfly runs. Sunraku puts his hands in his pockets.
Dragonfly's HP shrinks
KO
The onlookers stare blankly. Dragonfly flies back and lands on the ground.
Dragonfly punches. Sunraku punches. Dragonfly sidesteps.
Dragonfly has yoyo'd to the side.
Dragonfly recalls his body to his foot and double punches Sunraku's face.
Sunraku stretches out his arms, punching Dragonfly from a distance.
Dragonfly steps back, holding up his arms defensively
He plants his feet.
Dragonfly drops down and comes up closer, his body glitching and refracting.
Sunraku KO
Sunraku crouches, and a duplicate appears next to him.
Dragonfly swings a stretch punch.
Sunraku doppelgangers flying kick his punch.
The gray sky sits between crumbling sky scrapers
Sunraku approaches, looking down at us.
Teardrop lake
Katzo fishes. At the Hizutome house, Rakuro and Emi recoil from a giant fish head on the table.
Rabituza
Text, Palace of Rabituza
He winks
Label, Skill gardener
Linkable skills, Strong puncher 1, Loop slash 8, accel Max, Deerstep 7...
Link 6/6, Accel Level MAX + Set 2 Fighting Spirit level 7 = climax boost
Remaining, 80,150
5 points remaining
He chugs the ominous, green, smoking potion from a bottle wrapped in protective wards.
He glows gold. New skills, Inflight 1, Hand of fortune 1, Climax boost 1, Assassin pierce 1, Offroad 1, Hunger wolf. Learned.
Skate foot, Best step, Parry protect...
Elke wraps her ears over Emul's mouth
Vorpal Sword Tech  50k. Spear, 70k. Blade, 80k, Judo 90, 3 secrets.
Sunraku, 150 mahni
A white door appears
Thirdrema, at night
The Serpent's Apple
Pencilgon sits at a table with a drink and grapes.
She picks up a cup, drinks, and sets it down.
She squeezes a grape. It's red juice drops to the floor.
Sunraku stares away from us.
Rakuro passes through Sunraku's outline.
Sunraku stands with scars over his arms, back, and torso. Emul holds onto his neck by her ears.
Rei rests her head in her hand, eyes closed.
Katzo sits on the ground, resting her arm ona  raised knee.
Pencilgon's purple hair flows in the wind. She rests a hand over her heart.
Setsuna hold her hands behind her pack. She stares forward, her hair blowing in the wind.
Setsuna turns to look at us.
Pencilgon, Sunraku, and Katzo walk together through a field
Fade to white
Text, 2 weeks later...
Wall scroll, Constant progress
Piles of crumpled up paper cover a tatami mat floor
Rei sleeps on a table over a hand-written letter
Mana looks at the SLF poster on the game store wall.
A skyscraper towers over a city at night.
A deployment pipeline shows spinning yellow icons turning into green checkmarks.
Deploy ai 01 check, Deploy ai 02 check, Health check ai check, deploy complete check
Update completed
Text, 19, Various New Years
Pencilgon, Katzo, Emul, and Sunraku sit around a table at an inn
Carrot
Rei wears a red kimono and sits at her table, hosting a kotatsu blanket.
